name: splat
content:

the sound of something wet hitting a surface or of something hitting the surface of a liquid: I could hear the splat of paint as the artist flicked it onto the canvas. The wet sock landed on the floor with a splat.
More examplesFewer examplesThen suddenly, splat, there's red stuff everywhere.Every blow and bullet is punctuated by a wet splat.The rain splashed with relentless monotony into the tub outside the back door. A steady splat , splat, splat.

in a way that makes the sound of something wet hitting a surface or of something hitting the surface of a liquid: She fell splat into the water. She flipped an omelette, only to have it go splat all over the floor.
More examplesFewer examplesThe baby fell asleep while he was eating, his face falling splat into his bowl of soup.The giant had jumped splat into the middle of the canal.These yellow paint balls went splat, splat, hitting my camouflage trousers and combat jacket.
